title: BMW's new X5 M, X6 M Competition models, Suzuki's refreshed Baleno - Top new models of the week
text:
BMW is adding more firepower to its SUV variants with the addition of its X5 M and X6 M high performance SUVs boasting 460kW in Competition form.

Bentley's new Continental Convertible has the looks to match any exotic on the planet and also has the grunt to go with it. Its 6-litre, 12-cylinder powerplant culminates in 467kW!

Models you shouldn't miss

If you're in the market for an affordable fuel-sipping set of wheels then the refreshed Suzuki Baleno should be high up on your list of options. Find out pricing, specs and new changes.

WATCH | Bespoke drop-top royalty with the Bentley Continental Convertible

This year's version of the Toyko Motor Show is underway with plenty of next-generation concepts on show, including two new offerings from Mitsubishi.

Wheels24's Leigh-Ann Londt spent some time with Ford's frugal Figo. Check out what she had to say about the nimble hatchback.



Click on the links below to view the full article:
description: All the latest concepts from this year's Tokyo motor show to Bentley's 467kW Continental Convertible, here are the new models of the week.
